name: Filling Unknown
description:
One of the humanity's greatest questions - an answer to it remains unknown not because it's impossible to uncover, but because nobody wishes to know.

What are sausages made of?

Controls:

Left stick - left/right movement
Right stick - hook rotation
Right bumper - fire
A - sell sausage (atleast 5 collected ingredients)
B - remove collected ingredients

Created by:
Bartosz 'Conso' Lodziński - kod, design
Marcin 'DeathToast' Macias - kod, design
Jakub 'Cortez' Gąsiewski - kod
